languages.text: "Ты можешь вспомнить что-то необычное о путешествиях Теодоры? Может быть, связанное со словами "Эпитафия", "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума"?
"Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' ring a bell?"
languages.original_text: "Ты можешь вспомнить что-то необычное о путешествиях Теодоры? Может быть, связанное со словами "Эпитафия", "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума"?

traits.locale_text: "Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Perhaps something related to the words 'Epitaph', 'Incident N872-04', 'tech-blight'"?

languages.text: « Vous souvenez-vous de quelque chose d'inhabituel concernant les voyages de Théodora ? Les termes "épitaphe", "incident N872-04" ou "techno-fléau" vous évoquent-ils quelque chose ? »
languages.original_text: "Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' ring a bell?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous souvenez-vous de quelque chose d'inhabituel concernant les voyages de Théodora ? Les termes "épitaphe", "incident N872-04" ou "techno-fléau" vous évoquent-ils quelque chose ? »

languages.text: “西奥多拉的旅行中有没有发生过什么不同寻常的事情吗？‘荒垄碑碣’、‘N872-04号事故’、‘技术枯萎病’，这几个词有没有让你想起什么事情？”
languages.original_text: "Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' ring a bell?"

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉的旅行中有没有发生过什么不同寻常的事情吗？‘荒垄碑碣’、‘N872-04号事故’、‘技术枯萎病’，这几个词有没有让你想起什么事情？”

languages.text: "Ist bei Theodoras Reisen irgendetwas Ungewöhnliches geschehen? Erinnert Ihr Euch an etwas? Sagen Euch die Worte 'Epitaph', 'Vorfall N872-04' oder 'Tech-Seuche' etwas?"
languages.original_text: "Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' ring a bell?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist bei Theodoras Reisen irgendetwas Ungewöhnliches geschehen? Erinnert Ihr Euch an etwas? Sagen Euch die Wörter 'Epitaph', 'Vorfall N872-04' oder 'Tech-Seuche' etwas?"

languages.text: «¿Recuerda algo inusual sobre los viajes de Theodora? ¿Le suenan de algo las palabras "Epitafio", "incidente N872-04" o "tecnoplaga"?».
languages.original_text: "Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' ring a bell?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Recuerda algo inusual sobre los viajes de Theodora? ¿Le suenan de algo las palabras "Epitafio", "incidente N872-04" o "tecnoplaga"?

languages.text: 「シオドーラの旅に関して何か変わったことを思い出せるか？『エピタフ』、『N872-04事件』、または『テック・ブライト』という言葉に何か心当たりは？」
languages.original_text: "Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' ring a bell?"

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラの旅に関して何か変わったことを思い出せるか？『エピタフ』、『N872-04事件』、または『テック・ブライト』という言葉に何か心当たりは？」

languages.text: "Theodora'nın seyahatleriyle ilgili olağan dışı bir şeyler hatırlıyor musun? 'Sinyazıt', 'N872-04 Sayılı Hadise' veya 'tekno afeti' kavramları tanıdık geliyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "Can you recall anything unusual about Theodora's travels? Do the words 'Epitaph,' 'Incident N872-04,' or 'tech-blight' ring a bell?"

traits.locale_text: "Theodora'nın seyahatleriyle ilgili olağan dışı bir şeyler hatırlıyor musun? 'Kitabe', 'N872-04 Hadisesi' veya 'tekno afeti' kavramları tanıdık geliyor mu?"
